member.name: T:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine
member.summary: Wraps the functions contained in the FonixTalk TTS engine.

member.name: E:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Phoneme
member.summary: Fired when a phoneme event is invoked by the engine.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.DefaultRate
member.summary: The default speaking rate assigned to new instances of the engine.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.DefaultSpeaker
member.summary: The default voice assigned to new instances of the engine.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the engine.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the engine in US English.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.#ctor(System.String,System.UInt32,SharpTalk.TtsVoice)
member.summary: Initialize a new instance of the engine with the specified language, rate, and speaker voice.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.#ctor(System.UInt32,SharpTalk.TtsVoice)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the engine in US English with the specified rate and speaker voice.

member.name: P:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Voice
member.summary: Gets or sets the voice currently assigned to the engine.

member.name: P:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Rate
member.summary: Gets or sets the current speaking rate of the TTS voice.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.SpeakToMemory(System.String)
member.summary: Writes speech data to an internal buffer and returns it as a byte array containing 16-bit 11025Hz mono PCM data.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.SpeakToStream(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Writes speech data to the specified stream as 16-bit 11025Hz mono PCM data.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.SpeakToWavFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes speech data to a PCM WAV file.

member.name: P:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.SpeakerParams
member.summary: Gets or sets the current speaker parameters.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Pause
member.summary: Pauses TTS audio output.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Resume
member.summary: Resumes previously paused TTS audio output.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Reset
member.summary: Flushes all previously queued text from the TTS system and stops any audio output.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Sync
member.summary: Blocks until all previously queued text is processed.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Speak(System.String)
member.summary: Causes the engine to begin asynchronously speaking a specified phrase. If the engine is in the middle of speaking, the message passed will be queued.
member.param: The phrase for the engine to speak.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Finalize
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this instance.

member.name: M:SharpTalk.FonixTalkEngine.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this instance.

member.name: T:SharpTalk.FonixTalkException
member.summary: Contains information related to errors thrown by the TTS engine.

member.name: T:SharpTalk.LanguageCode
member.summary: Common language codes used for loading DECtalk dictionaries.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.EnglishUS
member.summary: United States English

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.EnglishUK
member.summary: United Kingdom English

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.SpanishCastilian
member.summary: Castilian Spanish

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.SpanishLatinAmerican
member.summary: Latin-American Spanish

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.German
member.summary: German

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.French
member.summary: French

member.name: F:SharpTalk.LanguageCode.None
member.summary: A special language code that tells SharpTalk not to load any language files.

member.name: T:SharpTalk.PhonemeEventArgs
member.summary: Holds information about phoneme events fired by the TTS engine.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.PhonemeEventArgs.Phoneme
member.summary: Indicates the phoneme being spoken.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.PhonemeEventArgs.Duration
member.summary: The duration of the phoneme in milliseconds.

member.name: T:SharpTalk.TtsVoice
member.summary: Enumerates the available voices for DECtalk.

member.summary: Default (male) voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Betty
member.summary: Full female voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Harry
member.summary: Full male voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Frank
member.summary: Aged male voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Dennis
member.summary: Male voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Kit
member.summary: Child's voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Ursula
member.summary: Aged female voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Rita
member.summary: Female voice.

member.name: F:SharpTalk.TtsVoice.Wendy
member.summary: Whispering female voice.
